About the Company: Jindal Stainless (Hisar) Ltd. is a stainless steel manufacturing company. Its products include slabs, blooms, hot rolled (HR) coil, cole rolled (CR) coil, plates, coin blanks, precision strips, blade steel and stainless steel plumbing. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Hisar, Haryana. Jindal Stainless (Hisar) Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Jindal Stainless Ltd.
